group_1.textRight: It's been a while, Iroha Tamaki.

group_1.textLeft: I thought you couldn't enter Kamihama City...
Oi, vermin!@What do you think you're doing here?!

group_1.textRight: Good grief, the Magical Girls of Futatsugi City@are as hostile as ever.
I'm not here to fight.
I'm just here to explain Kamihama@City's current situation.

group_1.textLeft: It must have to do with the@anomaly that Ui sensed...

group_1.textRight: The status of the Automatic Purification System@can determine whether we live or die.
I think it would be in our best interests to@listen to what Lord Kyūbē has to say.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hey, Kyubey. Did you do something@to the Automatic Purification System?

group_1.textRight: I think it would be more correct to@say that I "am doing" something.

group_1.textLeft: So, you're saying that it's still happening?

group_1.textRight: Of course. I've been here for quite some time now.

group_1.narration: "[textRed:Inside the core of the@Automatic Purification System.]"
―Iroha―@That can't be...
―Iroha―@Eve's body was scattered all over Kamihama, leaving only@the Automatic Purification System behind.
―Iroha―@And that was because userName@became the new core of the system...
―Kyubey―@And yet that core, userName,@came back to you.
―Tsuruno―@Isn't that because Kamihama City is inside of@the Automatic Purification System's Labyrinth?
―Kyubey―@Kamihama City is merely within the@Automatic Purification System's area of influence.
―Kyubey―@The reason that userName returned@was that I became the core instead.
―Felicia―@For real...?
―Felicia―@So then, you've really been inside the@Purification System for all this time?!
―Sana―@And as the core, you've been doing@something to the system all along...?
―Kyubey―@It's just as you've said.
―Kyubey―@I needed to see if the Doppel phenomenon was@capable of generating sufficient energy.
―Kyubey―@I really wanted to analyze the Automatic Purification@System and bring it under my control.
―Kyubey―@But when I first became the core, it was all I could do@to maintain the system, and I couldn't control it at all.
―Kyubey―@I lost many units before I was able to@seize some degree of command over it.
―Kyubey―@After much time, I'm finally able to@control the system's force field.
―Kyubey―@Indeed, the force field covering Kamihama City has now@disappeared, and I'm able to come and go as I please.
―Kyubey―@The force field also marks the area where the impurities@of Soul Gems are collected to allow for Doppels,
―Kyubey―@which means I now control the@Automatic Purification System's on-off switch.
―Kyubey―@When userName realized what I was up to,@it tried to interfere with my activities.
―Kyubey―@I'm glad I was able to catch it.

group_1.textRight: Kyu...
There's nothing that can be done with@just one of it, so I'll give it back.
I'm not opposed to deleting irregular units,
but this one still has value, so I'll@continue to observe it for now.
Mokyu, kyukyui...

group_1.textLeft: No, you don't have to apologize.
I'm the one that's sorry, for not realizing@how bad the situation was.
This must have been what you were@trying to tell us back then...

group_1.narration: ―Felicia―@If that's how it is, then we'll just@take the Purification System back from Kyubey!
―Felicia―@If userName knows where to go, we'll just storm the@Labyrinth where Kyubey's got his other body!
―Kyubey―@That's impossible.
―Kyubey―@Without someone that can become the core,@you'll never be able to find it.
―Chiharu―@Then, that means there's@nothing we can do about it...
―Ui―@No.
―Ui―@We can definitely find the core,@and we can take it back from Kyubey.
―Ui―@After all, I'm sure the reason the [textYellow:Kimochi] were suffering@was because Kyubey was controlling them.
―Ui―@The fact that he tried to use them to erase me@is proof that I'm in his way!
―Yachiyo―@Considering that Eve was the origin of the [textYellow:Kimochi],@it's natural that you would be able to control it.
―Yachiyo―@I wonder what you have to say@about Ui's explanation, Kyubey.
―Kyubey―@Generally speaking, you're both basically correct.
―Kyubey―@It's true that Ui Tamaki is currently a threat to me.
―Yachiyo―@And the reason for that?
―Kyubey―@Ui Tamaki is the origin of Eve.
―Kyubey―@She can control all the properties of the Automatic@Purification System, and the bodies of the [textYellow:Kimochi].
―Kyubey―@She's the only one who could take the@Purification System away from me.

group_1.textRight: What you just said isn't something we can overlook!

group_1.textLeft: Whoever holds all eight [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones can@control the Automatic Purification System...
That's what you said yourself, ain't it?!

group_1.textRight: That is what I was thinking at the time, yes.
But from what I've heard about your@possession of the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones,
you aren't even able to control their energy.
Yuna Kureha was taken over by four [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones,
and Ikumi Makino reached her limit with just one.
Of course, I can't say with certainty that@there's no way it can be done,
but it's undeniable that it would be very difficult@for anyone but Ui Tamaki to control.

group_1.textLeft: So, when the five [textYellow:Kimochi] left their Bracelets,
you seized control of all of the [textYellow:Kimochi] at once@and used them to attack Ui.

group_1.textRight: That was a miscalculation on my part.
I thought that I'd be able to control them@once I had harnessed the force field.
However, it's evident that I wasn't@able to control them completely.

group_1.textLeft: Well then...let me ask you one last question.
What reason did you have for@explaining all of this to us?

group_1.textRight: My goal is to compare the amount of emotional@energy that can be acquired
between the manifestation of Doppels@and the transformation into a Witch.
To that end, I wanted to give you an update@on the Automatic Purification System,
since if you expect to use a Doppel@and then turn into a Witch instead,
I won't be able to get accurate readings.

group_1.textLeft: I figured you'd say something like that.

group_1.textRight: Yes, indeed...
